text: Gynecomastia is when the breast in male humans are bigger than normal. It can happen to any male. == Types of gynecomastia == * True Gynecomastia / Glandular Hypertrophy * Pseudogynecomastia * Mixed == References == == External links == * Category:Andrology Category:Breast diseases Category:Endocrine diseases Category:Medical conditions related to obesity Category:Men's health
title: Gynecomastia
